ifreq Struct Reference

#include <if.h>

Detailed Description

Interface request structure used for socket ioctl's.


Data Fields

char ifr_name [IF_NAMESIZE]
union {
   u_long   ifru_addr
   u_long   ifru_dstaddr
   u_long   ifru_broadaddr
   u_short   ifru_flags [2]
   u_short   ifru_index
   int   ifru_metric
   int   ifru_mtu
   int   ifru_phys
   int   ifru_media
   int   ifru_cap [2]
} ifr_ifru
